text: Joseph Robinson (31 May 1927 â€“ 3 July 2017) was an English actor and stuntman. He was known for his roles in A Kid for Two Farthings, The Loneliness of the Long Distance Runner, and in Thor and the Amazon Women. Robinson died at the age of 90 on July 3, 2017, in Brighton, East Sussex of dementia-related complications. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Joe Robinson Official Website Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors who played in James Bond movies Category:Deaths from dementia Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Newcastle upon Tyne
title: Joe Robinson (actor)
